query:
ALTER TABLE fact_update_notifications
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notificationType ENUM('fact_update', 'debt_milestone', 'debt_payment_reminder', 'debt_strategy_update', 'learning_achievement', 'streak_reminder', 'quiz_result', 'budget_alert', 'system_alert', 'security_alert') DEFAULT 'fact_update' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS batchKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS batchCount INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS batchKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS batchCount INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL;
